channel.title: How I make Crafting and Herblore work?
channel.description: I wanna know how I make It work because now it doesn't work when I try to craft/herb Please help! PS: I'm on Hellz Scape v1

item.title: How I make Crafting and Herblore work?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

How about only this -

if ((itemUsed == 3000) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 3000)) { deleteItem(3000, getItemSlot(3000), 1); deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1); addItem(3024, 1); addSkillXP(2800, 15); setAnimation(1652); }

Read full topic
item.source: How I make Crafting and Herblore work?

Please help!
PS: I’m on Hellz Scape v1[/quote]
You mean item on item with XP added?
